data.eml:eml: Ototyphlonemertes longissima sp. nov. (Hoplonemertea: Monostilifera: Ototyphlonemertidae), a new interstitial nemertean from the South China Sea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Hai-Long, Sun, Shi-Chun (2018): Ototyphlonemertes longissima sp. nov. (Hoplonemertea: Monostilifera: Ototyphlonemertidae), a new interstitial nemertean from the South China Sea. Zootaxa 4527 (4): 581-587, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4527.4.9
